title: Lost Innocence: The Pristine Box Set
description: The undisputed master of impregnation is back for one last boxed set. Included are one hundred romance and e-romance short stories from Cassandra Zara's career. Nannies, steps, and inexperienced young ladies are just some of the characters you'll encounter, but every one of them is sexy as hell. Jealousy, love triangles, passion, and obsession all motivate her characters, but the primal urge to procreate is the reason why customers clamored for her work for years. Included are three never-before-published short stories. Additionally, enjoy, “Living My First Cassandra Zara Story” , a pristine and untouched story about a young woman about to enter college who thinks she has learned everything she needs to know about sex from Cassandra Zara's eBooks- until her first time changes it all. So join in and let this book take you, hard and unprotected !
author: Cassandra Zara
